description.oldValue:
Save time with AI based file suggestions in chat. As an expansion of suggested replies in chats, Teams uses AI to surface files when it detects in the conversation intent to share a file. Now, users will be able to respond to their chat message and attach a file in one click.
GA date: March CY2023
description.newValue:
Save time with AI based file suggestions in chat. As an expansion of
suggested replies in chats, Teams uses AI to surface files when it detects in
the conversation intent to share a file. Now, users will be able to respond to
their chat message and attach a file in one click.
